name: HandleGetAnimeCollection
comments: @summary returns the user's AniList anime collection.
@desc Calling GET will return the cached anime collection.
@desc The manga collection is also refreshed in the background, and upon completion, a WebSocket event is sent.
@desc Calling POST will refetch both the anime and manga collections.

api.summary: returns the user's AniList anime collection.
descriptions: Calling GET will return the cached anime collection.
The manga collection is also refreshed in the background, and upon completion, a WebSocket event is sent.
Calling POST will refetch both the anime and manga collections.

name: HandleGetRawAnimeCollection
comments: @summary returns the user's AniList anime collection without filtering out custom lists.
@desc Calling GET will return the cached anime collection.

api.summary: returns the user's AniList anime collection without filtering out custom lists.
descriptions: Calling GET will return the cached anime collection.

name: HandleEditAnilistListEntry
comments: @summary updates the user's list entry on Anilist.
@desc This is used to edit an entry on AniList.
@desc The "type" field is used to determine if the entry is an anime or manga and refreshes the collection accordingly.
@desc The client should refetch collection-dependent queries after this mutation.

api.summary: updates the user's list entry on Anilist.
descriptions: This is used to edit an entry on AniList.
The "type" field is used to determine if the entry is an anime or manga and refreshes the collection accordingly.
The client should refetch collection-dependent queries after this mutation.

name: HandleGetAnilistAnimeDetails
comments: @summary returns more details about an AniList anime entry.
@desc This fetches more fields omitted from the base queries.
@param id - int - true - "The AniList anime ID"

api.summary: returns more details about an AniList anime entry.
descriptions: This fetches more fields omitted from the base queries.

params.name: id
descriptions: The AniList anime ID

name: HandleGetAnilistStudioDetails
comments: @desc This fetches media produced by the studio.
@param id - int - true - "The AniList studio ID"

api.summary: returns details about a studio.
descriptions: This fetches media produced by the studio.

params.name: id
descriptions: The AniList studio ID

name: HandleDeleteAnilistListEntry
comments: @summary deletes an entry from the user's AniList list.
@desc This is used to delete an entry on AniList.
@desc The "type" field is used to determine if the entry is an anime or manga and refreshes the collection accordingly.
@desc The client should refetch collection-dependent queries after this mutation.

api.summary: deletes an entry from the user's AniList list.
descriptions: This is used to delete an entry on AniList.
The "type" field is used to determine if the entry is an anime or manga and refreshes the collection accordingly.
The client should refetch collection-dependent queries after this mutation.

name: HandleAnilistListAnime
comments: @summary returns a list of anime based on the search parameters.
@desc This is used by the "Discover" and "Advanced Search".

api.summary: returns a list of anime based on the search parameters.
descriptions: This is used by the "Discover" and "Advanced Search".

name: HandleAnilistListRecentAiringAnime
comments: @summary returns a list of recently aired anime.
@desc This is used by the "Schedule" page to display recently aired anime.

api.summary: returns a list of recently aired anime.
descriptions: This is used by the "Schedule" page to display recently aired anime.

name: HandleAnilistListMissedSequels
comments: @summary returns a list of sequels not in the user's list.
@desc This is used by the "Discover" page to display sequels the user may have missed.

api.summary: returns a list of sequels not in the user's list.
descriptions: This is used by the "Discover" page to display sequels the user may have missed.

name: HandleGetAniListStats
comments: @desc This returns the AniList stats for the user.

api.summary: returns the anilist stats.
descriptions: This returns the AniList stats for the user.

name: HandleGetLibraryCollection
comments: @summary returns the main local anime collection.
@desc This creates a new LibraryCollection struct and returns it.
@desc This is used to get the main anime collection of the user.
@desc It uses the cached Anilist anime collection for the GET method.
@desc It refreshes the AniList anime collection if the POST method is used.

api.summary: returns the main local anime collection.
descriptions: This creates a new LibraryCollection struct and returns it.
This is used to get the main anime collection of the user.
It uses the cached Anilist anime collection for the GET method.
It refreshes the AniList anime collection if the POST method is used.

name: HandleAddUnknownMedia
comments: @summary adds the given media to the user's AniList planning collections
@desc Since media not found in the user's AniList collection are not displayed in the library, this route is used to add them.
@desc The response is ignored in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire library collection.

api.summary: adds the given media to the user's AniList planning collections
descriptions: Since media not found in the user's AniList collection are not displayed in the library, this route is used to add them.
The response is ignored in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire library collection.

name: HandleGetAnimeEntry
comments: @summary return a media entry for the given AniList anime media id.
@desc This is used by the anime media entry pages to get all the data about the anime.
@desc This includes episodes and metadata (if any), AniList list data, download info...
@param id - int - true - "AniList anime media ID"

api.summary: return a media entry for the given AniList anime media id.
descriptions: This is used by the anime media entry pages to get all the data about the anime.
This includes episodes and metadata (if any), AniList list data, download info...

params.name: id
descriptions: AniList anime media ID

name: HandleAnimeEntryBulkAction
comments: @summary perform given action on all the local files for the given media id.
@desc This is used to unmatch or toggle the lock status of all the local files for a specific media entry
@desc The response is not used in the frontend. The client should just refetch the entire media entry data.

api.summary: perform given action on all the local files for the given media id.
descriptions: This is used to unmatch or toggle the lock status of all the local files for a specific media entry
The response is not used in the frontend. The client should just refetch the entire media entry data.

name: HandleOpenAnimeEntryInExplorer
comments: @summary opens the directory of a media entry in the file explorer.
@desc This finds a common directory for all media entry local files and opens it in the file explorer.
@desc Returns 'true' whether the operation was successful or not, errors are ignored.

api.summary: opens the directory of a media entry in the file explorer.
descriptions: This finds a common directory for all media entry local files and opens it in the file explorer.
Returns 'true' whether the operation was successful or not, errors are ignored.

name: HandleFetchAnimeEntrySuggestions
comments: @summary returns a list of media suggestions for files in the given directory.
@desc This is used by the "Resolve unmatched media" feature to suggest media entries for the local files in the given directory.
@desc If some matches files are found in the directory, it will ignore them and base the suggestions on the remaining files.

api.summary: returns a list of media suggestions for files in the given directory.
descriptions: This is used by the "Resolve unmatched media" feature to suggest media entries for the local files in the given directory.
If some matches files are found in the directory, it will ignore them and base the suggestions on the remaining files.

name: HandleAnimeEntryManualMatch
comments: @summary matches un-matched local files in the given directory to the given media.
@desc It is used by the "Resolve unmatched media" feature to manually match local files to a specific media entry.
@desc Matching involves the use of scanner.FileHydrator. It will also lock the files.
@desc The response is not used in the frontend. The client should just refetch the entire library collection.

api.summary: matches un-matched local files in the given directory to the given media.
descriptions: It is used by the "Resolve unmatched media" feature to manually match local files to a specific media entry.
Matching involves the use of scanner.FileHydrator. It will also lock the files.
The response is not used in the frontend. The client should just refetch the entire library collection.

name: HandleGetMissingEpisodes
comments: @summary returns a list of episodes missing from the user's library collection
@desc It detects missing episodes by comparing the user's AniList collection 'next airing' data with the local files.
@desc This route can be called multiple times, as it does not bypass the cache.

api.summary: returns a list of episodes missing from the user's library collection
descriptions: It detects missing episodes by comparing the user's AniList collection 'next airing' data with the local files.
This route can be called multiple times, as it does not bypass the cache.

name: HandleGetAnimeEntrySilenceStatus
comments: @summary returns the silence status of a media entry.
@param id - int - true - "The ID of the media entry."

api.summary: returns the silence status of a media entry.

params.name: id
descriptions: The ID of the media entry.

name: HandleToggleAnimeEntrySilenceStatus
comments: @summary toggles the silence status of a media entry.
@desc The missing episodes should be re-fetched after this.

api.summary: toggles the silence status of a media entry.
descriptions: The missing episodes should be re-fetched after this.

name: HandleUpdateAnimeEntryProgress
comments: @summary update the progress of the given anime media entry.
@desc This is used to update the progress of the given anime media entry on AniList.
@desc The response is not used in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire media entry data.
@desc NOTE: This is currently only used by the 'Online streaming' feature since anime progress updates are handled by the Playback Manager.

api.summary: update the progress of the given anime media entry.
descriptions: This is used to update the progress of the given anime media entry on AniList.
The response is not used in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire media entry data.
NOTE: This is currently only used by the 'Online streaming' feature since anime progress updates are handled by the Playback Manager.

name: HandleUpdateAnimeEntryRepeat
comments: @summary update the repeat value of the given anime media entry.
@desc This is used to update the repeat value of the given anime media entry on AniList.
@desc The response is not used in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire media entry data.

api.summary: update the repeat value of the given anime media entry.
descriptions: This is used to update the repeat value of the given anime media entry on AniList.
The response is not used in the frontend, the client should just refetch the entire media entry data.

name: HandleLogin
comments: @summary logs in the user by saving the JWT token in the database.
@desc This is called when the JWT token is obtained from AniList after logging in with redirection on the client.
@desc It also fetches the Viewer data from AniList and saves it in the database.
@desc It creates a new handlers.Status and refreshes App modules.

api.summary: logs in the user by saving the JWT token in the database.
descriptions: This is called when the JWT token is obtained from AniList after logging in with redirection on the client.
It also fetches the Viewer data from AniList and saves it in the database.
It creates a new handlers.Status and refreshes App modules.

name: HandleLogout
comments: @summary logs out the user by removing JWT token from the database.
@desc It removes JWT token and Viewer data from the database.
@desc It creates a new handlers.Status and refreshes App modules.

api.summary: logs out the user by removing JWT token from the database.
descriptions: It removes JWT token and Viewer data from the database.
It creates a new handlers.Status and refreshes App modules.

name: HandleRunAutoDownloader
comments: @summary tells the AutoDownloader to check for new episodes if enabled.
@desc This will run the AutoDownloader if it is enabled.
@desc It does nothing if the AutoDownloader is disabled.

api.summary: tells the AutoDownloader to check for new episodes if enabled.
descriptions: This will run the AutoDownloader if it is enabled.
It does nothing if the AutoDownloader is disabled.

name: HandleGetAutoDownloaderRule
comments: @summary returns the rule with the given DB id.
@desc This is used to get a specific rule, useful for editing.
@param id - int - true - "The DB id of the rule"

api.summary: returns the rule with the given DB id.
descriptions: This is used to get a specific rule, useful for editing.

params.name: id
descriptions: The DB id of the rule

name: HandleGetAutoDownloaderRulesByAnime
comments: @summary returns the rules with the given media id.
@param id - int - true - "The AniList anime id of the rules"

api.summary: returns the rules with the given media id.

params.name: id
descriptions: The AniList anime id of the rules

name: HandleGetAutoDownloaderRules
comments: @desc This is used to list all rules. It returns an empty slice if there are no rules.

api.summary: returns all rules.
descriptions: This is used to list all rules. It returns an empty slice if there are no rules.

name: HandleCreateAutoDownloaderRule
comments: @desc The body should contain the same fields as entities.AutoDownloaderRule.

api.summary: creates a new rule.
descriptions: The body should contain the same fields as entities.AutoDownloaderRule.
It returns the created rule.

name: HandleUpdateAutoDownloaderRule
comments: @desc The body should contain the same fields as entities.AutoDownloaderRule.

api.summary: updates a rule.
descriptions: The body should contain the same fields as entities.AutoDownloaderRule.
It returns the updated rule.

name: HandleDeleteAutoDownloaderRule
comments: @desc It returns 'true' if the rule was deleted.
@param id - int - true - "The DB id of the rule"

api.summary: deletes a rule.
descriptions: It returns 'true' if the rule was deleted.

params.name: id
descriptions: The DB id of the rule

name: HandleGetAutoDownloaderItems
comments: @desc Queued items are episodes that are downloaded but not scanned or not yet downloaded.
@desc The AutoDownloader uses these items in order to not download the same episode twice.

api.summary: returns all queued items.
descriptions: Queued items are episodes that are downloaded but not scanned or not yet downloaded.
The AutoDownloader uses these items in order to not download the same episode twice.

name: HandleDeleteAutoDownloaderItem
comments: @desc This is used to remove a queued item from the list.
@desc Returns 'true' if the item was deleted.
@param id - int - true - "The DB id of the item"

api.summary: delete a queued item.
descriptions: This is used to remove a queued item from the list.
Returns 'true' if the item was deleted.

params.name: id
descriptions: The DB id of the item

name: HandleUpdateContinuityWatchHistoryItem
comments: @desc This endpoint is used to update a watch history item.
@desc Since this is low priority, we ignore any errors.

api.summary: Updates watch history item.
descriptions: This endpoint is used to update a watch history item.
Since this is low priority, we ignore any errors.

name: HandleGetContinuityWatchHistoryItem
comments: @desc This endpoint is used to retrieve a watch history item.
@param id - int - true - "AniList anime media ID"

api.summary: Returns a watch history item.
descriptions: This endpoint is used to retrieve a watch history item.

params.name: id
descriptions: AniList anime media ID

name: HandleGetContinuityWatchHistory
comments: @desc This endpoint is used to retrieve all watch history items.

api.summary: Returns the continuity watch history
descriptions: This endpoint is used to retrieve all watch history items.

api.summary: get debrid settings.
descriptions: This returns the debrid settings.

name: HandleSaveDebridSettings
comments: @desc The client should refetch the server status.

api.summary: save debrid settings.
descriptions: This saves the debrid settings.
The client should refetch the server status.

name: HandleDebridAddTorrents
comments: @desc This adds a torrent to the debrid service.

api.summary: add torrent to debrid.
descriptions: This adds a torrent to the debrid service.

name: HandleDebridDownloadTorrent
comments: @desc Manually downloads a torrent from the debrid service locally.

api.summary: download torrent from debrid.

name: HandleDebridCancelDownload
comments: @desc This cancels a download from the debrid service.

name: HandleDebridDeleteTorrent

name: HandleDebridGetTorrents

name: HandleDebridCancelStream

name: HandleDirectorySelector
comments: @summary returns directory content based on the input path.
@desc This used by the directory selector component to get directory validation and suggestions.
@desc It returns subdirectories based on the input path.
@desc It returns 500 error if the directory does not exist (or cannot be accessed).

api.summary: returns directory content based on the input path.
descriptions: This used by the directory selector component to get directory validation and suggestions.
It returns subdirectories based on the input path.
It returns 500 error if the directory does not exist (or cannot be accessed).

name: HandleSetDiscordMangaActivity
comments: @summary sets manga activity for discord rich presence.

api.summary: sets manga activity for discord rich presence.

name: HandleSetDiscordLegacyAnimeActivity
comments: @summary sets anime activity for discord rich presence.

api.summary: sets anime activity for discord rich presence.

name: HandleSetDiscordAnimeActivityWithProgress
comments: @summary sets anime activity for discord rich presence with progress.

api.summary: sets anime activity for discord rich presence with progress.

name: HandleUpdateDiscordAnimeActivityWithProgress
comments: @summary updates the anime activity for discord rich presence with progress.

api.summary: updates the anime activity for discord rich presence with progress.

name: HandleCancelDiscordActivity
comments: @summary cancels the current discord rich presence activity.

api.summary: cancels the current discord rich presence activity.
returns the API documentation

name: HandleDownloadTorrentFile
comments: @summary downloads torrent files to the destination folder

api.summary: downloads torrent files to the destination folder

name: HandleDownloadRelease
comments: @summary downloads selected release asset to the destination folder.
@desc Downloads the selected release asset to the destination folder and extracts it if possible.
@desc If the extraction fails, the error message will be returned in the successful response.
@desc The successful response will contain the destination path of the extracted files.
@desc It only returns an error if the download fails.

api.summary: downloads selected release asset to the destination folder.
descriptions: Downloads the selected release asset to the destination folder and extracts it if possible.
If the extraction fails, the error message will be returned in the successful response.
The successful response will contain the destination path of the extracted files.
It only returns an error if the download fails.

name: HandleOpenInExplorer
comments: @summary opens the given directory in the file explorer.
@desc It returns 'true' whether the operation was successful or not.

api.summary: opens the given directory in the file explorer.
descriptions: It returns 'true' whether the operation was successful or not.

name: HandleFetchExternalExtensionData
comments: @summary returns the extension data from the given manifest uri.

api.summary: returns the extension data from the given manifest uri.

name: HandleInstallExternalExtension

api.summary: installs the extension from the given manifest uri.

name: HandleUninstallExternalExtension
comments: @summary uninstalls the extension with the given ID.

api.summary: uninstalls the extension with the given ID.

name: HandleUpdateExtensionCode
comments: @summary updates the extension code with the given ID and reloads the extensions.

api.summary: updates the extension code with the given ID and reloads the extensions.
reloads the external extensions.

name: HandleReloadExternalExtension
comments: @summary reloads the external extension with the given ID.

api.summary: reloads the external extension with the given ID.
returns the loaded extensions

name: HandleGetExtensionPayload

api.summary: returns the payload of the extension with the given ID.
returns the development mode extensions

name: HandleGetAllExtensions

name: HandleGetExtensionUpdateData

name: HandleListOnlinestreamProviderExtensions

returns the installed torrent providers.
returns the plugin settings.

name: HandleSetPluginSettingsPinnedTrays

name: HandleGrantPluginPermissions

name: HandleRunExtensionPlaygroundCode
comments: @summary runs the code in the extension playground.

name: HandleGetExtensionUserConfig
comments: @summary returns the user config definition and current values for the extension with the given ID.

name: HandleSaveExtensionUserConfig
comments: @summary saves the user config for the extension with the given ID and reloads it.

api.summary: saves the user config for the extension with the given ID and reloads it.
returns the marketplace extensions.

name: HandleGetFileCacheTotalSize
comments: @summary returns the total size of cache files.
@desc The total size of the cache files is returned in human-readable format.

api.summary: returns the total size of cache files.
descriptions: The total size of the cache files is returned in human-readable format.

name: HandleRemoveFileCacheBucket
comments: @summary deletes all buckets with the given prefix.
@desc The bucket value is the prefix of the cache files that should be deleted.
@desc Returns 'true' if the operation was successful.

api.summary: deletes all buckets with the given prefix.
descriptions: The bucket value is the prefix of the cache files that should be deleted.
Returns 'true' if the operation was successful.

name: HandleGetFileCacheMediastreamVideoFilesTotalSize
comments: @summary returns the total size of cached video file data.
@desc The total size of the cache video file data is returned in human-readable format.

@desc Returns 'true' if the operation was successful.

comments: @desc Reminder that local files are scanned from the library path.

name: HandleImportLocalFiles
comments: @summary imports local files from the given path.
@desc This will import local files from the given path.
@desc The response is ignored, the client should refetch the entire library collection and media entry.

api.summary: imports local files from the given path.
descriptions: This will import local files from the given path.
The response is ignored, the client should refetch the entire library collection and media entry.

name: HandleLocalFileBulkAction
comments: @summary performs an action on all local files.
@desc This will perform the given action on all local files.
@desc The response is ignored, the client should refetch the entire library collection and media entry.

api.summary: performs an action on all local files.
descriptions: This will perform the given action on all local files.
The response is ignored, the client should refetch the entire library collection and media entry.

name: HandleUpdateLocalFileData

@desc This will update the local file with the given path.

comments: @desc This will remove empty directories in the library path.

name: HandleMALAuth
comments: @summary fetches the access and refresh tokens for the given code.
@desc This is used to authenticate the user with MyAnimeList.
@desc It will save the info in the database, effectively logging the user in.
@desc The client should re-fetch the server status after this.

api.summary: fetches the access and refresh tokens for the given code.
descriptions: This is used to authenticate the user with MyAnimeList.
It will save the info in the database, effectively logging the user in.
The client should re-fetch the server status after this.

name: HandleEditMALListEntryProgress
comments: @summary updates the progress of a MAL list entry.

api.summary: updates the progress of a MAL list entry.

name: HandleMALLogout
comments: @summary logs the user out of MyAnimeList.
@desc This will delete the MAL info from the database, effectively logging the user out.
@desc The client should re-fetch the server status after this.

api.summary: logs the user out of MyAnimeList.
descriptions: This will delete the MAL info from the database, effectively logging the user out.
The client should re-fetch the server status after this.

name: HandleGetAnilistMangaCollection
comments: @summary returns the user's AniList manga collection.

api.summary: returns the user's AniList manga collection.

name: HandleGetRawAnilistMangaCollection
comments: @summary returns the user's AniList manga collection.

api.summary: returns the user's AniList manga collection.

name: HandleGetMangaEntry
comments: @summary returns a manga entry for the given AniList manga id.
@desc This is used by the manga media entry pages to get all the data about the anime. It includes metadata and AniList list data.
@param id - int - true - "AniList manga media ID"

api.summary: returns a manga entry for the given AniList manga id.
descriptions: This is used by the manga media entry pages to get all the data about the anime. It includes metadata and AniList list data.

descriptions: AniList manga media ID

name: HandleGetMangaEntryDetails
comments: @summary returns more details about an AniList manga entry.
@desc This fetches more fields omitted from the base queries.
@param id - int - true - "AniList manga media ID"

name: HandleGetMangaLatestChapterNumbersMap
comments: @summary returns the latest chapter number for all manga entries.

api.summary: returns the latest chapter number for all manga entries.

name: HandleRefetchMangaChapterContainers
comments: @summary refetches the chapter containers for all manga entries previously cached.

api.summary: refetches the chapter containers for all manga entries previously cached.

name: HandleEmptyMangaEntryCache
comments: @summary empties the cache for a manga entry.
@desc This will empty the cache for a manga entry (chapter lists and pages), allowing the client to fetch fresh data.
@desc HandleGetMangaEntryChapters should be called after this to fetch the new chapter list.
@desc Returns 'true' if the operation was successful.

api.summary: empties the cache for a manga entry.
descriptions: This will empty the cache for a manga entry (chapter lists and pages), allowing the client to fetch fresh data.
HandleGetMangaEntryChapters should be called after this to fetch the new chapter list.
Returns 'true' if the operation was successful.

name: HandleGetMangaEntryChapters
comments: @summary returns the chapters for a manga entry based on the provider.

api.summary: returns the chapters for a manga entry based on the provider.

name: HandleGetMangaEntryPages
comments: @summary returns the pages for a manga entry based on the provider and chapter id.
@desc This will return the pages for a manga chapter.
@desc If the app is offline and the chapter is not downloaded, it will return an error.
@desc If the app is online and the chapter is not downloaded, it will return the pages from the provider.
@desc If the chapter is downloaded, it will return the appropriate struct.
@desc If 'double page' is requested, it will fetch image sizes and include the dimensions in the response.

api.summary: returns the pages for a manga entry based on the provider and chapter id.
descriptions: This will return the pages for a manga chapter.
If the app is offline and the chapter is not downloaded, it will return an error.
If the app is online and the chapter is not downloaded, it will return the pages from the provider.
If the chapter is downloaded, it will return the appropriate struct.
If 'double page' is requested, it will fetch image sizes and include the dimensions in the response.

The episodes are cached using a file cache.

name: HandlePlaybackPlayVideo
comments: @summary plays the video with the given path using the default media player.
@desc This tells the Playback Manager to play the video using the default media player and start tracking progress.
@desc This returns 'true' if the video was successfully played.

This returns 'true' if the video was successfully played.

name: HandlePlaybackPlayRandomVideo
comments: @summary plays a random, unwatched video using the default media player.
@desc This tells the Playback Manager to play a random, unwatched video using the media player and start tracking progress.
@desc It respects the user's progress data and will prioritize "current" and "repeating" media if they are many of them.
@desc This returns 'true' if the video was successfully played.

api.summary: plays a random, unwatched video using the default media player.
descriptions: This tells the Playback Manager to play a random, unwatched video using the media player and start tracking progress.
It respects the user's progress data and will prioritize "current" and "repeating" media if they are many of them.
This returns 'true' if the video was successfully played.
